overview: There's nothing like a big, fat, juicy, uncut cock to make these horny young lads happy; and to prove it we've collected together a dozen of the hottest, cutest lads ever to appear in front of the Staxus cameras - each one either hung like the proverbial, or armed with an insatiable appetite for oversized schlongs. Studio legends, Benjamin Dunn, Sven Laarson and Milan Sharp lead an all-star cast; as happy arses sink balls-deep onto some of the biggest shafts around.
title: Big Boyz Happy Arses!
